text: Abo Sabanika iNcwadi bayavuyiswa koko Sikutyhile kuwe (i’Kur’ân) Kodwa phakathi kwabo balubumbano (AmaYuda nabahedeni) kukho abaphika inxalenye yako. Yithi (Muhammad): “Mna ndiyalelwe ukuba ndinqule uAllâh Yedwa, ndingayamanisi mahlulelane kuYe. Ndibiza kuYe (Yedwa) yaye kukuYe apho ndiza kubuyela khona.”
